dialogue.text: Man! That was a lot of fun! You’re pretty good at this rapping thing huh?
Well, he is Boyfriend afterall, his rapping skills did win my heart~
I knew the two of you looked familiar! Boyfriend and Girlfriend huh? So is it really true that you’re a demon GF?
Ahahaha, yeah it is! Though most people don’t seem to care about that fact.
???: Renko dearie, please stop pestering the poor girl with your love of the occult
Oh! There you are Merry! I was waiting for you! I just met these two celebrities and had a rap battle against Boyfriend!
How lovely!
Though I would prefer it if you would stop pestering them. I apologize about Renko, she can get excited easily.
Don’t worry about it! We actually wanted to rap against her since BF was bored and heard about your secret club from a friend of ours.
See Merry! I wouldn’t bother them if they didn’t ask for it!
Oh Renko, never change. Though, I’m not sure why we call this the Secret Sealing Club if a lot of people know about it.
Hey, you came up with the name, not me.
Beep boop bap?
Well, I wouldn’t mind joining the club, though that’s for Renko and Merry to decide.
You can just call me Maribel. I’m only called Merry since Renko here can’t say my name properly.
Hey! I try my best! It’s not my fault that your name is hard to say! Marubelle…... Mamareberu...
You’re going to bite your tongue Renko.
Though back to the topic at hand.
Yeah! If you want to join the club, you’ll have to pass our initiation test!
…Renko… we don’t have an initiation. We never came up with one.
Oh right...  heheheh...
How about a rap battle then? I would love to have a turn!
Works for us!
I’ll stand to the side and let you do the singing this time Merry!  Plus...
Renko grabs two comically large sized pints of beer and gives one to GF.
I want to drink my beer while you go!
You and your so-called thinking juice. Alright Boyfriend, let’s go!
